params.text: “ Halala! Ubaba uyeza ekhaya. Ngizwa amabhuzu akhe — thump thump thump!   ” UMalik uthanda ukuzwa lowo msindo.
Thump! Thump! Thump! “  Kuzwakala sengathi ibhola ligxuma, kodwa ngiyazi ukuthi amabhuzu kaBaba ”
Ubaba kaMalik uyamvumela ukuba aboleke amabhuzu akhe. UMalik ufuna ukwenza i-thump thump thump izwakale.
Amabhuzu kababa makhulu kakhulu. a ’ cishe a ’ be makhulu njengo Malik!
Amabhuzu kababa aphezulu kakhulu. Co! Manje uMalik angasukuma abe mude.
Manje uMalik ufuna ukukeza njengoBaba. Kodwa lezi amabhuzu esindayo kakhulu  …   Kodwa kungani kungekho umsindo we – thump thump thump?
Hmm, mhlawumbe uMalik kufanele aphakamise unyawo lwakhe phezulu? Awu, ouch! Zinzima kakhulu.
Uyashelela, udoti uya yonke indawo. UMalik angaphinde ayihlanze kanjani?
Kuthiwani uma ekhipha nje amabhuzu? Ouch! Imbovane iluma unyawo lwayo.
Oooh, lezi zimbovane zihamba ngenkathi ziphethe ukudla. zibukeka njengesitimela sokudla.
Choo choo! Amaloli amathoyizi aseMalik nawo angathwala izinto njengesitimela. Choo choo!
UHmm, uMalik ufaka amabhodlela emotweni ephuzi. Bese efaka i-glue emotweni ebomvu.
Okulandelayo, ubeka amaqabunga emotweni eluhlaza. Kodwa imoto incane kakhulu.
Ngakho ubeka amaqabunga ebhuthini. Amabhuzu angathwala izinto futhi.
Choo choo  …  thump thump. Haibo! UMalik unesitimela eside. Choo choo  …  thump thump.
Ubaba uyaziqhenya ngoMalik ngokuhlanza njengaye nje.

“Amabhuzu kababa” credits

This work, “Amabhuzu kababa” is a derivative of Dad’s Boots. Author: Saptorini. Illustrator: Weny Amalia. Editor: Nurhayati Pujiastuti.
